moves.1. e4 e5 2. f4 Nc6 3. g3 Nf6 4. Nf3 Bd6: I don't know what I was thinking with this move.  I hung my knight, and I this gave his queen a relatively unimpeded path into my interior lines.  Instead I should have castled queen side.
moves.14... Qxd4 15. Rd1: This move sealed my fate.  I think a better move would likely have been Bd3.
moves.15... Qe4+ 16. Kd2 Bg4: In retrospect, I see that he's setting me up here.  I had my eyes on Bxf7 and missed the fact that he's triangulating me with his bishop and queen.
moves.17. Bxf7+ Kf8 18. Qb5: Terrible move and served no purpose.  I should have gone Bxe8.
moves.18... Red8+ 19. Kc1: Another big mistake.  I'm going to ground, and trapping myself.  I think a better move here would have been h3, but at this point his bishop could move away from that threat and still maintain his pressure on my king.  I could also have gotten my h rook to safety, allowing him to assist in the kings defense.
moves.19... Rxd1+: Game is effectively over at this point.  I could have resigned here.
